documentType.description: Document type specified in the Veeva document extract flow.

includeAllVersions.description: Boolean value to include All Versions of files in Veeva document extract flow.

includeRenditions.description: Boolean value to include file renditions in Veeva document extract flow.

includeSourceFiles.description: Boolean value to include source files in Veeva document extract flow.

object.description: Object specified in the flow destination.
